Miscellaneous Highlights: The U.S. needed a win or a no result in their final Group A game at Lauderhill in Florida on Friday to reach the Super Eight stage.
Others: The U.S. will now play South Africa (on June 19), West Indies (on June 22) and one of England or Scotland (on June 23).
The top two in each group will progress to the semifinals before the tournamentâ€™s final, at the Kensington Oval, Bridgetown, Barbados, on June 29.
